title: How We Got Here #12 The Teens: Warning: Bridge Out!  2011-2019 (Trump, Jordan Peterson, Obama, BLM)
description:
(Timestamps below)
So get ready to binge watch this epic multi-copyright claimed epic edition of How We Got Here. We've arrived at the 2010s. And things have gotten molten hot. The culture war continues but in such a bizarre way as bring former opponents together against the new antagonist.  And obviously this is longer than any other video I have ever done. Take it in measured doses through the timestamps or swallow it all whole. This is YOUR world now.

Navigate the video:
0:00 - Intro
02:15 - An Explanation of this Episode
14:45 - Occupy Wall Street (Tim Pool)
40:05 - Back Lives Matter
1:04:50 - Social Justice Warriors
1:11:15 - The Trans Movement
1:42:30 - Gamergate
2:12:45 - The Great Meme War
2:24:20 - The Alt-Right
2:45:15 - The American Elections 2016
3:04:30 - Intermission: The Chicago Cubs Win the World Series
3:06:35 - Donald Trump is elected President
3:29:20 - Trump vs the Mass Media
3:32:40 - The Battles of Berkeley
3:46:25 - Evergreen State College 
3:55:55 - Antifa
4:13:45 - Charlottesville
4:58:40 - Jordan B. Peterson
5:31:05 - The Intellectual Dark Web and Beyond
5:39:35 - More Faces - Right Left, and Center
5:42:30 - Chaos in the Global Village (Marshall McLuhan)
5:50:13 - Who We Now Are - America 2019
5:56:13 - Prelude to 2020
.....
My Odysee pages for this epic.

From Tbilisi Georgia (Look it up on a map!) 
Swimming Against the Stream

Byrne
